comments: It\'s really hard to learn the software he teaches because he does them up on the screen and if you can\'t keep up and do it along with him during the class, you have no idea how to do the homework. He\'s also never around besides when he teaches the class, so you can\'t get help from him. However, he lets you redo the projects until you get them right
nice guy but his CAD/Revit class is pretty boring. The assignments are easy and fun, but at times can get a little time consuming. Try to take notes. Good GPA booster

I took Barry Mink\'s Arch 199 AutoCAD course in Spring 2006. He is very knowledgeable with AutoCAD. I highly recommend his course if you need to learn AutoCAD. If you already know it than don\'t take it cause he goes over foundation principles of the program.
